column1: APA SOUTHERN STATES BATTLE OF THE BAD
TWR denotes Teenage World Record   MS denotes Mississippi Record     LA denotes Louisiana Record
A denotes American Record   wr denotes World Record   ar denotes Arkansas record   $ denotes Michigan Record
Best Lifter Award (Deadlift): James Paul Williams
Best Lifter Award (Bench Press): Frank Nichols

Lifters drove from several states including Michigan, Arkansas, Louisiana to attend this event. Each lifter received a sword mounted on a plaque as an award. Judging was tight and the spotters were fantastic. Special thanks to Brent Smith for making this meet possible, Chad McMullin and Travis Werner for lending equipment utilized in running this event and all who helped set up the platform and move equipment around.  Several more APA meets are being scheduled for Vicksburg, Mississippi so stay tuned for more great lifting action.
